title: MSTU: Observations on Top Lane Tanks

replies.body: Riot doesn't understand that fighters almost uniformly have sustain, and if you cut tanks damage they absolutely can't lane. Old Sunfire rush might have been cancer, but it was also a necessity. Tanks got tools for lategame, but nothing that would help them _survive_ Darius and the like.
Honestly I think the main reason Maokai did so well in lane wasn't because of his ult, but because he was the only top lane tank with sustain.
{{champion:79}} {{champion:36}}  {{champion:31}}   u wot m8
Mundo ain't a tank m8. The other two were rarely played in top.
Mundos as much of a tank as Cho'gath...and cho gath top has actually seen a lot more play post the rework on his ult

> [{quoted}](name=Gnarles Barkleyy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bYuQIwXF,comment-id=00010000000100000000,timestamp=2017-05-05T17:32:54.545+0000)
>
> **Mundos as much of a tank** as Cho'gath...and cho gath top has actually seen a lot more play post the rework on his ult

Normally I'd disagree but I also don't see Cho'gath as a tank. He's more of an AP juggernaut imo. 

So yeah, he's as much as a tank as Cho I guess. Which is, not really.

Sunfire was always a terrible item on Shen, honestly, it was good in lane but fell off so fucking hard after midgame and in teamfights.

{{item:3153}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3022}} {{item:3053}} 

All decent damage items, Bork is good, Triforce is decent, Frozen Mallet means you snowball a million times harder, although not recommended if you're having trouble winning your own lane unless it's a problem of being kited, and Sterak's buffs made it decent.

I tried going full tank Shen, and honestly it didn't work. I couldn't carry because I had nowhere near enough damage to kill carries in teamfights, or hell, even 1v1 carries. With Bork, Triforce, Frozen Mallet, or Steraks, or any combination of the four (might be others too)

In my more recent games, I've been buying two or three or hell even 4 damage items (when I go jungle shen, I get Bloodrazor), and I've gotten multiple S's and S+'s and have a much higher winrate.
{{item:3748}} If you skip Sunfire, you litterally have no waveclear

> [{quoted}](name=Tidal Tyrant,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bYuQIwXF,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-05-04T20:31:57.856+0000)
>
> {{item:3748}} If you skip Sunfire, you litterally have no waveclear

I just pick up a Tiamat and build it into a Rav later, Titanic is a terrible item in my experience. It gives damage, but it doesn't give enough dps to kill anyone from 100 health in a timely fashion.
On Shen it's definetly gonna provide you more than Ravenous would lol

> [{quoted}](name=Tidal Tyrant,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bYuQIwXF,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-04T21:23:14.069+0000)
>
> On Shen it's definetly gonna provide you more than Ravenous would lol

The onhit damage is minimal, and I like the AoE of Rav better over a cone. Also I like having a lot of damage - with a heavy damage Shen build {{item:1419}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3022}} {{item:3053}} {{item:3074}} {{item:3047}} I've killed a Lux on my own with an E over a wall, in about 5 hits.
That being said I usually upgrade Tiamat last item anyway, since Tiamat is a lot smoother for me.
Shen already has enough single target DPS on his Q. Having durability is more important in most scenarios.

> [{quoted}](name=5000000000000000,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bYuQIwXF,comment-id=000400000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-04T23:14:05.078+0000)
>
> Shen already has enough single target DPS on his Q. Having durability is more important in most scenarios.

It's decent, but the ability to kill a carry in 5 Q's is sooo good in teamfights, and the ability to bully your lane opponent with heavy damage/Frozen Mallet lets you snowball a million times harder.
Frozen Mallet also gives some CC that Shen badly lacks, especially if you miss E, but even if you dont, for after E ends.
Full tank Shen can kill a carry. DPS Shen gets outshined like crazy because his entire existence sucks at synergizing with damage builds.

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bYuQIwXF,comment-id=00040000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-04T23:35:24.318+0000)
>
> Full tank Shen can kill a carry. DPS Shen gets outshined like crazy because his entire existence sucks at synergizing with damage builds.

Not quickly, and not mid game.

I've fought tank Shens as Quinn. They take about 60% of my health when they land a good taunt.

With my Bork or Frozen Mallet, I've killed my target super easily. Once faced a Riven, they were dumb and decided to finish their fast combo and then auto a bit more, without dashing away. That Riven died. Tank Shen simply can't do that.

I've killed a Lux in 5 hits with my more damage oriented builds.

> [{quoted}](name=Cant Hold Me Now,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bYuQIwXF,comment-id=000400000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-04T23:45:54.615+0000)
>
> Not quickly, and not mid game.

Mid game is actually the only time you can reliably duel a carry. After that lifesteal gets disgusting.
> I've fought tank Shens as Quinn. They take about 60% of my health when they land a good taunt.

So 60% of your HP as Quinn was about 400 maximum? That is one squishy as hell Quinn. Also, taunt damage scales with HP, so...
> With my Bork or Frozen Mallet, I've killed my target super easily. Once faced a Riven, they were dumb and decided to finish their fast combo and then auto a bit more, without dashing away. That Riven died. Tank Shen simply can't do that.

Shen shits on Riven even HARDER if he builds tank. If Riven can't kill someone with her combo she's a sitting duck. The only champion Shen arguably counters is Riven.
> I've killed a Lux in 5 hits with my more damage oriented builds.

I can do that easily with auto-cancelling titanic procs. Land taunt, which snaps into an auto at the right range, pull Q, auto-proc titanic, auto again. Boom, crap ton of damage that can burst down any squishy.

But it isn't. Humans are strange creatures.
